subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baltimore agreed Friday to trade the left-handed starter Érik Bédard to the Seattle Mariners in exchange for outfielder Adam Jones, who will probably be the Orioles’ starting center fielder on opening day.
snippet: Baltimore agreed Friday to trade the left-handed starter Érik Bédard to the Seattle Mariners in exchange for outfielder Adam Jones, who will probably be the Orioles’ starting center fielder on opening day.
